SEARCH
Package Users

Class Buyer

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Buyer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Buyer extends User implements Serializable
Class containing information about a buyer. This class is an extension of User and implements java.io.Serializable.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
